article: A young man and an old man  are walking  in the park. The old man  _  tired so he  wants  to have a rest. There is a chair in front of the young man. The old man sees the chair. He wants  to sit  on the chair. He walks to the chair. The young man walks to it, too. So the old man begins to run. The young man say, "  Don't  sit on the chair! " The old man doesn't  listen to  him. Now he  is sitting  on it. He looks  happy  .The young man comes over to him. He is  _  a small board in his hand. It  _  "Wet Paint "
